root.InquirySqlQuery: SELECT * FROM CETRX.TRX_INBOX WHERE C_MAIN_REF = '$mainref' AND C_UNIT_CODE = '${unitcode}' AND I_EVENT_TIMES = ${eventtimes} AND C_MODULE = '${modulename}'

F05030700829.Query: SELECT * FROM CETRX.OWGT_EM_GTEEDTLS WHERE C_MAIN_REF = '${mainref}' AND C_UNIT_CODE = '${unitcode}' AND I_EVENT_TIMES = ${eventtimes}
